Read in libraries and data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(rsample)
library(lubridate)
library(caret)
library(modelr)
library(parallel)
library(foreach)
library(readr)
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(zoo)
library(knitr)
library(magrittr)
library(haven)

lott = read_dta("~/Documents/Causal Inference/LottMustardExtension/data/Lott_Dataset.dta") #the lott data
#original data sets
statelevel = read_dta("~/Documents/Causal Inference/LottMustardExtension/data/UpdatedStateLevelData-2010.dta") 
countylevel = read_dta("~/Documents/Causal Inference/LottMustardExtension/data/UpdatedCountyCrimeData-2010.dta")
```

Data Cleaning and Analysis
```{r}
countylevel = countylevel%>%
  filter(year < 1993) %>%
  arrange(desc(year))

#verify that we filtered correctly
unique(countylevel$year)

#create an average murder rate (ratmur) per year for 1977 to 1992 and draw it in a time series using ggplot

avgratmur = countylevel %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(avgmur = mean(ratmur, na.rm = 1))

avgmur = countylevel %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(avgmur = mean(mur, na.rm = 1))

ggplot(avgratmur) +
  geom_line(aes(x = year, y = avgmur))

ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = year, y = avgmur))
```
